programlisting:
def teardown(user, virtual_mfa_device): """ Removes all resources created during setup.
:param user: The demo user. :param role: The demo MFA device. """ for user_pol in user.policies.all(): user_pol.delete() print("Deleted inline user policy.") for key in user.access_keys.all(): key.delete() print("Deleted user's access key.") for mfa in user.mfa_devices.all(): mfa.disassociate() virtual_mfa_device.delete() user.delete() print(f"Deleted {user.name}.")
